title: Destroyer - Your Blues (2004) - 192kbps
description:
In naval terminology, a destroyer is a fast and maneuverable yet long-endurance warship intended to escort larger vessels in a fleet or battle group and defend them against smaller, short-range but powerful attackers (originally torpedo boats, later submarines and aircraft).

But as you may very well know, an album is not a navy. No way Jose.


------------------------------------------------------------------


Destroyer is a band consisting of Daniel Bejar who is only one man. As you may have figured out, Destroyer isn\&#039;t really a band after all. But it is almost a band, come on go along with it. Yeah. 

So this is an album called Your Blues and it is rate nice.

Oh yeah, the Destroyer-man also did stuff with New Pornographers which is awesome and features Neko Case (wicked) and Carl Newman (he is the shit). And Bejar also \"joined together with members of Frog Eyes and Wolf Parade to create another indie supergroup known as Swan Lake\" recently.


------------------------------------------------------------------

 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Your_Blues" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Your_Blues</a>

Pitchfork reviewed and approved http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/record_review/16988-your-blues

The album is from 2004 and quote quote:

\"It has been variously described by critics as \"some kind of masterpiece, the work of a truly original and iconoclastic talent\", \"a bold step in a new direction, risking over-the-top theatricality, but with its feet planted firmly on solid ground\", \"seeming like a work in progress\" and \"an acquired taste\".

While, with its Metacritic \"Metascore\" of 79 out of 100, it could be considered to be critically well-received, frontman Dan Bejar conceded that it may be viewed by some as a \"half-baked exercise\", and the MIDI instrumentation as \"completely hokey and completely sabotaging the legitimacy of the songs\".
